ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:21:34 [Issue ID 4000-130287] urn:comicvine:4000-130287 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 23:58:30. [Issue ID 165308]
ComicInfo.Summary: What? There's someone actually reading this space? Well since we have your attention, we're going to tell you something very, very important. It's something extremely profound, beautiful, and will help you understand the universe better - and it's just for you, so don't share it with anyone else. Are you listening? Ok, here goes: "Wherever you go, there you are." There. Now that we've given you something, buy our mag!

ComicInfo.Title: Mad’s Prime-Time TV Listings; Bored of the Rings: The Feeble Schtick of Ka-Ching!; No Emotions Eleven; Sports Acronyms You Never Knew Existed; A Mad Look at The Lord of the Rings; If Medical Marijuana Was Legalized…; The Final Minute of Saturday Night Live; Their Team… & Your Team…; The Mad (Dead) People Watcher’s Guide at a Typical Cemetery; Mad Examines Selected Pages in a Typical High School Theater Program; Monroe and… Babysitting; Drama on Page 14
